00023 #ifndef CAPTION_TEST_H
00024 #define CAPTION_TEST_H

00029 #include <caption.h>

00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00038 template<class GAMECLASS> 
00039 class CaptionTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture 
00040 {
00041 
00043   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( CaptionTest );
00044 
00050   CPPUNIT_TEST( testCaptionText );
00051 
00057   CPPUNIT_TEST( testCaptionType );
00058 
00064   CPPUNIT_TEST( testCaptionHeight );
00065

00100 
00102   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00103 protected:
00107   GAMECLASS     *m_caption;
00108   
00109 public:
00115   int countTestCases(){
00116     return 1;
00117   }
00118 
00122   void setUp(){ 
00123     this->m_caption = new GAMECLASS; 
00124   }
00125   
00129   void tearDown(){ 
00130     delete this->m_caption; 
00131   }
00132   
00139   void testCaptionText(){ 
00140     std::string t="TestString";
00141     this->m_caption->setText(t);
00142     std::string ret=this->m_caption->getText();
00143     int cmp=t.compare(ret);
00144     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( cmp==0 );
00145   }
00146 
00153   void testCaptionType(){ 
00154     RainbruRPG::Terminal::tCaptionType t=RainbruRPG::Terminal::SCROLLED;
00155     this->m_caption->setType(t);
00156     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getType()==t );
00157   }
00158 
00165   void testCaptionHeight(){
00166     int h=12;
00167     this->m_caption->setHeight(h);
00168     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getHeight()==h );
00169   }
00170 
00177   void testCaptionWidth(){
00178     int h=10;
00179     this->m_caption->setWidth(h);
00180     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getWidth()==h );
00181   }
00182 
00189   void testCaptionXOffset(){
00190     int h=4;
00191     this->m_caption->setXOffset(h);
00192     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getXOffset()==h );
00193   }
00194 
00201   void testCaptionYOffset(){
00202     int h=5;
00203     this->m_caption->setYOffset(h);
00204     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getYOffset()==h );
00205   }
00206 
00213   void testCaptionXpos(){
00214     int h=65;
00215     this->m_caption->setXPos(h);
00216     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( this->m_caption->getXPos()==h );
00217   }
00218 
00225   void testCaptionYPos(){
